questions.question: Viscosity is most closely related to

explanations.a: Diffusion is related but not primarily connected to viscosity.
explanations.b: Adhesive force is not the dominant factor for viscosity.
explanations.c: Cohesive forces between molecules influence viscosity most strongly.
explanations.d: Friction occurs due to viscosity but is not the cause.

questions.question: Which of the following one has greatest viscosity?

explanations.a: Glycerin has very high viscosity due to strong intermolecular forces.
explanations.d: Mercury is dense but not as viscous as glycerin.

questions.question: The clouds float in atmosphere which is due to

explanations.a: High temperature isn't the primary reason for floating.
explanations.b: Viscosity isn't the factor in cloud buoyancy.
explanations.d: Clouds have low terminal velocity allowing them to float.
